content: type of instructions - written instructions - english only and us crochet terminology used - visual help - paid version only skill level - you must know how to read a crochet pattern - you must know basic crochet stitches - chain and double_crochet - you must know how to work in the round - you must know how to follow crochet written instructions - best for advanced beginners to intermediate crocheters finished size - 23 5 inch square approx yarn & hook - any aran yarn yarn brand and yards included in the pattern - 5mm crochet hook terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free pdf version of my free pattern
